title: Ep 330 | The One Party Phil Definitely Wants to Attend & Why Christians Are the True Secret Service
description:
Jase believes that Christians are the original Secret Service. Phil and Jase discuss why they would both want to attend a certain type of party and why belief in the Lord is more powerful than death itself. Jase and Al talk about how a sermon can be a real teaching moment — especially when the listener sees it come to life. And Phil and Jase believe that everybody needs a person who’s willing to ask them the hard questions.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
